creator: Androidmate
descriptionHtml:
Catchphrase is the fun and hilarious guessing game that Jimmy Fallon plays on the Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon. The goal of the game Catchphrase is to get your partner to guess the word by giving him/her verbal and physical clues and not to be the person holding the device when the timer goes off.


Catchphrase Game Major Features

• More than 100,000 + words / phrases
• Small download size
• Lots of categories to choose from
• Play offline with 4 friends or hundreds of them
• Change the time of each round
• Add your own words
• Play and keep score in team mode
• Fun for all ages
• Free word game to play
• The game doesn't need wifi

Catch phrase is a fun party game that you can play with your friends. Catchphrase can be played in groups of 4, 6 or 8. Catchphrase has the best parts of all other games - the urgency of musical chairs, the physical gestures of charades, the verbal clues of pyramid or password.

Catchphrase rules & How to play it

Have everyone sit in a circle. Every second person is on the same team.

The goal of the game is to get your teammate to guess the word without using
-- The word or any part of it
-- Any Rhyming Words

If your team guesses the word correctly pass the device to the person on your right (which is of the other team).

Tap on the screen to get the next word
Continue passing the device until the timer runs out.

The team holding the device when the buzzer beeps looses.

The words could be anything ranging from movie titles, song titles, objects to professions and action.

There are different variation in which you can play this game

Catchphrase is an introduction to the world of drinking games like beer bong, flip cup,would you rather, who am i etc.

As a drinking game Catchphrase can be played in the following way

-- Make teams of two and stand across your partner
-- The basic rules of the game applies
-- The team that looses now have to drink beer or do shots

As charades

-- The basic rules of the charades applies
-- Instead of saying out clues try to act them out

As heads up

- Instead of you viewing the word you put the device on your head and your partner has to make you guess the word
- If you guess the word then you pass the device to the next player

Are you tired of looking for group games online to make your night more happening?
Then look no further, download this party game and become a party master.

This is a great indoor party game for all kinds of parties. Be it a birthday party, engagement party, wedding party, kitty party, halloween party or an office party you can play this game everywhere. Be it a drinking game to play with your friends or a game to play at a picnic with your family, catch phrase is the ultimate dose of fun.


This product is in no way affiliated or endorsed by Hasbro or the Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon and should not be confused with their product, Catchphrase.
descriptionShort: Catch Phrase is the perfect group game for your house party

Catch phrase is a fun party game that you can play with your friends. Catchphrase can be played in groups of 4, 6 or 8. Catchphrase has the best parts of all other games - the urgency of musical chairs, the physical gestures of charades, the verbal clues of pyramid or password.

Catchphrase rules & How to play it

Have everyone sit in a circle. Every second person is on the same team.

The goal of the game is to get your teammate to guess the word without using
-- The word or any part of it
-- Any Rhyming Words


If your team guesses the word correctly pass the device to the person on your right (which is of the other team).

Tap on the screen to get the next word
Continue passing the device until the timer runs out.

The team holding the device when the buzzer beeps looses.

The words could be anything ranging from movie titles, song titles, objects to professions and action.

There are different variation in which you can play this game


As charades

-- The basic rules of the charades applies
-- Instead of saying out clues try to act them out

As heads up

- Instead of you viewing the word you put the device on your head and your partner has to make you guess the word
- If you guess the word then you pass the device to the next player

The goal of the game Catchphrase is to get your partner to guess the word by giving him/her verbal and physical clues and not to be the person holding the device when the timer goes off.


Catchphrase Game Major Features

• More than 100,000 + words / phrases
• Small download size
• Lots of categories to choose from
• Play offline with 4 friends or hundreds of them
• Change the time of each round
• Add your own words
• Play and keep score in team mode
• Fun for all ages
• Free word game to play
• The game doesn't need wifi
• Multiple Decks/Categories to choose from



Catch phrase is a fun party game that you can play with your friends. Catchphrase can be played in groups of 4, 6 or 8. Catchphrase has the best parts of all other games - the urgency of musical chairs, the physical gestures of charades, the verbal clues of pyramid or password.

Catchphrase rules & How to play it

Have everyone sit in a circle. Every second person is on the same team.

The goal of the game is to get your teammate to guess the word without using
-- The word or any part of it
-- Any Rhyming Words


If your team guesses the word correctly pass the device to the person on your right (which is of the other team).

Tap on the screen to get the next word
Continue passing the device until the timer runs out.

The team holding the device when the buzzer beeps looses.

The words could be anything ranging from movie titles, song titles, objects to professions and action.

There are different variation in which you can play this game


As charades

-- The basic rules of the charades applies
-- Instead of saying out clues try to act them out

As heads up

- Instead of you viewing the word you put the device on your head and your partner has to make you guess the word
- If you guess the word then you pass the device to the next player

Are you tired of looking for group games online to make your night more happening?
Then look no further, download this party game and become a party master.

This is a great indoor party game for all kinds of parties. Be it a birthday party, engagement party, wedding party, kitty party, halloween party or an office party you can play this game everywhere. Be it a party game to play with your friends or a game to play at a picnic with your family, catch phrase is the ultimate dose of fun. Just like cards against humanity get ready to bring your nasty side to life.

creator: LazyTrunk
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Catchphrase! Where words spark laughter, connections grow stronger, and every gathering turns into an unforgettable event! Whether you’re looking to liven up a party, make family time more engaging, or simply find a fun way to pass the time when you are getting bored, Catchphrase is your go-to solution for lively entertainment that everyone can enjoy.

🎉 Turn Every Social Gathering into a Hit! 🎉
Boredom at social gatherings? Not anymore! Catchphrase is the perfect icebreaker to keep your party guests engaged and entertained. Easy to pick up but hard to put down, this game brings people together through fast-paced guessing and hilarious hints. Whether you’re with old friends or new acquaintances, laughter is just a phrase away. Pick up this game to play when you are getting bored

👋 Say Goodbye to Awkward Silences! 👋
Feel the room getting a bit shy? Catchphrase offers a structured way to encourage everyone to loosen up and join the fun. This game doesn’t just prompt conversation—it sparks genuine interaction and belly laughs, making it easier for everyone to open up and enjoy the moment. Just select the category/deck liked by all and see the ice melting away. Perfect game to play when you have to break the ice.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family Time Redefined 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
Catching up with family has never been this much fun! With various modes and difficulties, Catchphrase appeals to all age groups. From kids to grandparents, everyone can join in on the fun, creating memories that last a lifetime. No more struggling to find a game that everyone likes; Catchphrase is here to make every family night special.

🚕 Entertainment on the Go! 🚕
Long road trips? Tiring camping trips? No problem! Catchphrase offers endless entertainment right at your fingertips. Playable on any mobile device, our game is the perfect companion for all your travels and gatherings, turning dull moments into bursts of joy and competition.

📵 Play Offline! 📵
No internet? No worries! Catchphrase can be played offline, making it an ideal game for areas with spotty internet connection or while travelling. Download it once and keep the game going wherever you are, ensuring that your entertainment is never halted by connectivity issues. You don’t need to look for any other game to play offline.

🌟 Less Screen Time, More Play Time! 🌟
Sitting with the TV remote, wondering what to watch? Tired of passive scrolling and excessive screen time on your phone? Catchphrase is a vibrant alternative to passive entertainment like TV watching or endless scrolling. Engage your brain, challenge your reflexes, and enjoy active participation in a game that’s as stimulating as it is amusing. It is a game to stop scrolling and start having fun. You can post the videos of your fun night on social media, to make the others jealous 😉

🎈 Stress-Free Event Planning 🎈
Planning an event and worrying about the entertainment? Let Catchphrase take the pressure off. Known for its universal appeal and ease of play, it’s the perfect activity to include in any event, ensuring that your guests have the time of their lives.

Some amazing game features:
> Dynamic Game Modes: Choose from a variety of themes and categories.
> Engaging Play Mechanics: Guess phrases in any font size before the timer runs out!
> Multiplayer Fun: Play with friends, family, or against the clock.
> Offline Capability: Enjoy the game without needing an internet connection.
> Family-Friendly: Suitable for all ages and perfect for family gatherings.
> Portable: Play anytime, anywhere, right on your mobile device.

🌟 What Are You Waiting For? 🌟
Download Catchphrase now and start the fun! Perfect for your next party, family game night, or any time you need a burst of fun. Join thousands of happy players and let the words roll!
